10.1007/978-3-030-77772-2_6.title: Morality Beyond the Lines: Detecting Moral Sentiment Using AI-Generated Synthetic Context
10.1007/978-3-030-77772-2_6.author: Qian, Ming and Laguardia, Jaye and Qian, Davis
10.1007/978-3-030-77772-2_6.paperMotivationText: "Reading between the lines", i.e. detecting moral sentiment in text when it is expressed implicitely, is not an easy task.
10.1007/978-3-030-77772-2_6.paperContributionText: The authors generate a dataset containing prompt-answer pairs related to the presence of US military bases overseas. Then, they use this dataset to fine-tune a GPT-2 model to produce texts. They then compare the presence of MFD keywords in the texts produced by the fine-tuned GPT-2 model and a vanilla GPT-2 model. This allows them to find differences w.r.t. the use of terms linked to moral foundations in both generated texts.
10.1007/978-3-030-77772-2_6.paperResultsText: The results are in line with literature on the relationship between US oversea military bases and local populations.
